question_sentence: The average cost of a classic Thanksgiving feast is up by how much from 2020, per an American Farm Bureau Federation survey?
Tampa Bay Rays phenom Wander Franco agreed to a massive 11-year, $182 million contract extension. How many MLB games has he played?
A manuscript partially written by Albert Einstein is up for auction. It features equations that helped lead Einstein to which theory?
The 2022 Grammy nominees were announced this week. Which artist had the most nominations?
A jury awarded plaintiffs how much in a  lawsuit against white supremacists behind violence at Charlottesville “Unite the Right” rally?
Dollar Tree caused a stir among some customers this week when the company announced:
choices: It would be closing 50% of its stores
It is increasing the price of most products to $1.25
It is not offering holiday hours

question_sentence: Three men were found  guilty of murder in Ahmaud Arbery’s February 2020 death. How long after the killing were they arrested?
The typical American consumes about how many calories in a Thanksgiving meal, according to the Calorie Control Council?
As gas prices keep climbing, President Joe Biden ordered the Energy Department to do what?
choices: Study the economic effects of a possible ban on gas-powered cars
Help expedite the creation of additional Amtrak routes
Release 50 million barrels of oil from emergency reserves
Order 50 million barrels of oil from Saudi Arabia

question_sentence: Keanu Reeves said he's “married under the eyes of God” to:
The first female prime minister of which country was forced to resign after just seven hours?
evidence: Magdalena Andersson, a former finance minister, stepped down after she lost a vote on her budget causing the Green Party to leave her coalition government

question_sentence: Survivors of which fatal accident called for compensation after they were subjected to stressful medical tests?
evidence: Survivors described the medical tests following the coal waste disaster are being akin to ‘torture’

question_sentence: The government was forced to set aside £1.7bn to prop up which collapsed energy supplier?
evidence: Business Secretary Kwasi Kwarteng told the Commons that bailout would ‘provide an ultimate safety net to protect consumers and ensure continued supply’

question_sentence: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer’s reign as Manchester United boss ended after a 4-1 defeat by which team?
evidence: A statement by the club said that his dismissal ‘should not obscure all the work he has done over the past three years to rebuild the foundations for long-term success’

question_sentence: A 72-year-old former lawyer made headlines after it emerged that he has visited 8,000 restaurants serving which cuisine?
evidence: David R. Chan from Los Angeles said that he was unimpressed on his first visit to a Chinese restaurant, explaining that ‘the food was not sophisticated’

question_sentence: Ministers voted through which controversial legislation described by the Unite union as the ‘NHS privatisation bill’?
evidence: Health Secretary Sajid Javid dismissed objections as ‘complete nonsense’ after Unite’s General Secretary said the bill would ‘bring in more privatisation by the back door’

question_sentence: A leading Russian politician was threatened with losing his parliamentary seat after allegedly shooting what animal?
evidence: Vladimir Putin has been accused of trying to stitch up Valery Rashkin, leader of the Moscow branch of Russia’s Communist Party, who was arrested and charged over the illegal shooting

question_sentence: Liam Booth-Smith, who is rumoured to have been behind a slew of negative briefings against Boris Johnson, is a senior adviser to which cabinet minister?
evidence: The special adviser to the chancellor is rumoured to have told BBC political editor Laura Kuenssberg that there is ‘a lot of concern in the building about the PM’

question_sentence: A woman was discovered to be only the second person ever to have completely eliminated which virus without treatment?
evidence: The woman, known as the ‘Esperanza Patient’, could hold the secret to removing all traces of the virus from sufferers’ genes. Find out more on The Week Unwrapped

question_sentence: Hard-right former congressman Jose Antonio Kast finished ahead of left-wing lawmaker Gabriel Boric in the first round of presidential voting in which country?
evidence: The presidential vote has thrown up ‘stark’ choice between far-right populist and leftist millennial, The Guardian said
